title: Everything Family Tree Book: Research and Preserve Your Family History
description: Completely updated for today's search tactics and blockades, The Everything Family Tree Book has even more insight for the stumped! Whether you're searching in a grandparent's attic or through the most cryptic archiving systems, this book has brand-new chapters on what readers have been asking Chock-full of tips the competitors don't have, this is the one-stop resource for successful sleuthing!
author: Kimberly Powell
